articles.title: The great American ice cream truck is roaring back with desserts delivered to a street near you
articles.summary: Scream Truck, a New Jersey startup, revives the ice cream truck tradition with a digital-age twist, allowing customers to summon treats via text using their IMPLSE logistics platform.  They are expanding nationally, aiming for 1,000 trucks within five years and are partnering with brands like Pat LaFrieda and Levain Cookies. Scream Truck is also rolling out its first pizza truck concept and planning promotions, including a partnership with a slasher franchise for Halloween.

articles.title: The great American ice cream truck is roaring back with on-demand desserts delivered to a street near you
articles.author: EMMA SALETTA
articles.summary: Scream Truck is expanding its services with a new pizza truck concept and plans to roll out 1,000 trucks nationally within five years. The company also revealed its plan to launch in Las Vegas later this summer, with a plan to launch 10-15 trucks over the next 18 months, and previewed upcoming promotions like a Halloween partnership and a 'Santa Social's' special.

articles.title: Korea's First Global Beauty App to Curate K-Beauty Luxury for Less
articles.author: Jennifer Ford
articles.summary: YLESS has launched a new shopping app that provides U.S. consumers access to over 1,000 K-beauty products from 20 brands previously unavailable stateside. The app features exclusive offerings like the Wink collection which provides luxury-level dupes of popular products, and the First-Try lineup showcasing brand-new formulas like BLAC3 Blood Drop Lip Oil.

articles.title: 44 Cheap Versions Of Expensive Summer Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The content highlights introductions to various affordable alternatives to high-end beauty and fashion products, like E.l.f.'s Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, an alternative for fragile lashes and E.l.f.'s Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops, compared to Glow Recipe's Watermelon Dew Drops. Catrice's Magic Shaper Face Cream Palette is being offered as an $8 alternative to the Makeup Forever Palette.

articles.title: 30 Items To Help You Travel With A Carry-On
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article highlights several new travel products designed for convenience and space-saving. These include the Cadence Capsules for toiletries, the Hackwith Design House shirt with multiple styling options, and the Subtl Beauty Stack for condensed makeup. These items aim to simplify packing and travel by minimizing bulk and maximizing functionality.

articles.title: 34 Newer TikTok-Approved Products
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Anua launched azelaic acid serum which is a skin soother which helps to reduce redness and blemishes. Nyx launched Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum which can be used as lip stain and lasts for the whole day. Oxo launched compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer capable of making concentrated coffee in minutes.

articles.title: 70 Bougie, Brilliant Gifts For Men That Are Shockingly Under $25 On Amazon
articles.summary: The article presents a curated list of affordable gift ideas for men, highlighting a variety of newly launched or updated products across different categories. It contains the product features and price.

articles.title: Gwyneth Paltrow defends selling controversial $75 vagina candle: ‘Go f–k yourself!'
articles.summary: Goop, founded by Gwyneth Paltrow, sells controversial candles, including 'This Smells Like My Vagina'. Following the success of the initial scent, Goop introduced 'This Smells Like My Orgasm' and 'This Smells Like My Prenup'. In 2022, Goop also launched the 'Hands Off My Vagina' candle, benefiting the ACLU Foundation's Reproductive Freedom Project.

articles.title: Shoppers rush to Aldi to pick up dupe for Cadbury favourite
articles.author: Karim Camara
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced new Honeycomb Clusters, positioned as a dupe of Cadbury's Crunchie Clusters, generating excitement among shoppers. Additionally, Home Bargains is offering a dupe of Polish chocolate bars, significantly cheaper than the original.

articles.title: I tried a robot vacuum in my 2-bed flat to see if it's worth ditching my traditional model for
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: The Ultenic D10 robot vacuum, retailing at £179.99 (on sale for £152.99) at Amazon, offers automated home vacuuming. The D10 maps the home, has customized cleaning actions through the app, and is capable of scheduling cleans and returning to base for charging. The D10 has the ability to suck up dirt effectively and it offers 'Matrix' navigation ensuring coverage of every inch of the floor.

articles.title: 'Boring but Brilliant Basics': Shilpa Suresh's Winning Marketing Strategy For HIT and Good Knight
articles.author: Tsunami Costabir
articles.summary: Godrej Consumer Products Ltd (GCPL) has introduced three new innovations under its HIT brand. These include new molecules in the incense stick format, the electric liquid vaporizer format, and the aerosol spray format. These products are designed to be superior to their predecessors and ahead of competing products.

articles.title: GWM Tank 700 review: this car is the real deal
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: Great Wall Motors (GWM) is launching the Tank 700, a new off-road vehicle. The Tank 700 currently has a 3.0-litre twin-turbo V6 plug-in hybrid engine, and a V8 version is expected in the next 12-18 months with improved specs. The Tank 700 features adjustable air suspension, multiple drive modes and a luxurious interior, and its price is expected to be around $100,000.

articles.title: Convenience stores launch smaller-sized products for price-conscious consumers
articles.author: KIM KYUNG-MI
articles.summary: Korea Seven (7-Eleven) is releasing smaller, 300ml sizes of detergents (Pure Poddeuk, Actz Perfect Baking Soda) and fabric softener (Pigeon Concentrated Mystic Rain). GS25 launched 3,000-won moisturizers, body washes and body lotions. CU partnered with suppliers to introduce smaller-sized serums, moisturizers, face masks and acne patches.

articles.title: Can a Kindle be set up to read e-books and do nothing else? May 18, 2025 10:33 AM Subscribe
articles.summary: The discussion covers the Kindle Paperwhite's capabilities, including accessing ebooks and browsing the internet (though the browser experience is described as poor). An alternative product, the Boox ereader, an Android tablet, is suggested for users who want to read non-Kindle books and control app access.

articles.title: Kashmir's Digital Gamechanger
articles.author: Mukeet Akmali
articles.summary: BrandSparc, an AI automation agency based in Srinagar, has launched to empower local businesses with AI-driven solutions. BrandSparc's service portfolio includes intelligent workflows, AI chatbots, and AI-driven digital marketing to streamline operations and reduce manual workload for businesses. The agency also develops intelligent websites with AI-integrated tools to enhance business growth.

articles.title: Cherry Portable Shoe Dryer a travel-friendly essential
articles.summary: Cherry introduces the Cherry Portable Shoe Dryer, a lightweight and versatile device designed to quickly and efficiently dry shoes and clothing. It features hot air circulation, antibacterial properties, and multiple drying modes. The product is available on Shopee, Lazada, and the Cherry Shop.

articles.title: Ask Slashdot: Would You Consider a Low-Latency JavaScript Runtime For Your Workflow?
articles.summary: Amazon's AWS Labs has created LLRT, an experimental, lightweight JavaScript runtime environment. This new product is designed to be lightweight.

articles.title: De'Longhi La Specialista Touch review: 'I have finally reached coffee nivana, and I'm not going back'
articles.author: Adam Cailler Senior reporter
articles.summary: De'Longhi has released the La Specialista Touch bean-to-cup coffee machine, featuring bean adapt technology, a cool-touch auto steam wand, and cold brew in under five minutes. The machine offers fine-tuning of grind sizes and brewing temperatures, and includes a plant milk setting. The reviewer recommends it as a worthwhile investment for coffee enthusiasts.

articles.title: This midrange robot vacuum cleans as well as some flagship models - and it's 50% off
articles.author: Maria Diaz
articles.summary: Ecovacs launched the Deebot N30 Omni, initially priced at $799 but now on sale for $400. The Deebot N30 Omni features auto-emptying, mop washing and drying, and 10,000Pa suction power with a Zero Tangle brush roller and TruEdge Adaptive Edge technology.

articles.title: 32 Products With Results That'll Inspire You
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The content highlights various cleaning and personal care products such as Maybelline's Dark Circles Treatment Concealer, L'Oréal repairing hair treatment, and Essence mascara. Other products described include Hard as Hoof nourishing cream and various cleaning solutions for different household cleaning tasks. The article introduces these products through descriptive reviews and highlights their features and benefits.

articles.title: Don't miss rare Dyson hair styling tools on sale for Memorial Day ✨
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Dyson is offering $100 off select hair styling tools for Memorial Day, including the Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer and Airstrait Straightener in limited edition colors like Strawberry Bronze and Jasper Plum. Customers receive free shipping, a two-year warranty, and a 30-day money-back guarantee.

articles.title: Editor confessions: 22 slightly embarrassing things we use on the sly
articles.summary: Yahoo editors highlight Poo-Pourri's Before-You-Go toilet spray as an essential product they use daily. An editor won't leave home without Poo-Pourri.

articles.title: Netflix to implement new AI feature streamers will hate
articles.author: Christy Rakoczy
articles.summary: Netflix is launching a new ad technology in 2025 that uses generative AI to create personalized ads integrated into their shows. This technology aims to make ads less intrusive for users on the ad-supported plan, which currently has 94 million monthly users, by overlaying ads with show-related content and providing calls to action during midroll and pause states.

articles.title: 44 Cheap Alternatives To Expensive Products You'll Love
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article introduces several budget-friendly alternatives to popular and often expensive beauty, home, and fashion products. For instance, the E.l.f. Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen is highlighted as a clear sunscreen similar to Supergoop! but at a lower price, and the Govee neon rope light is recommended as a customizable lighting solution comparable to Hue. Essence's Lash Princess Mascara is presented as an affordable alternative to higher-end mascaras, offering similar results at a fraction of the cost.

articles.title: KitchenAid mixer price slashed by $166 in early Memorial Day 2025 sale
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: Bed Bath & Beyond is offering deals on KitchenAid Artisan Series 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer, reducing the price by 34% to $330. They are also offering the Ninja Creami ice cream maker for under $200, a versatile machine with seven different settings for various frozen treats.

articles.title: 'I compared all the butters in supermarkets - one stole Lurpak's crown'
articles.summary: Lidl introduced "Daisy," a butter alternative. Testers found it had a rich taste but couldn't eat more than a couple of servings.

articles.title: Reviewers Are Singing The Praises Of These 35 Genius Kitchen Products
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article presents a range of innovative kitchen and home products designed to simplify cooking, cleaning, and organization. Some of the new products listed in the article includes time-saving fruit and veggie divider, rapid egg cooker, foaming garbage disposal cleaners, spinning water bottle organizer and space-saving ceramic folding griddle.

articles.title: Streamline Windows with Microsoft PowerToys
articles.author: Ben Smith
articles.summary: Microsoft's PowerToys enhances the Windows experience with utilities like FancyZones for window management, Image Resizer for easy image resizing, and Text Extractor for pulling text from images. These utilities streamline workflows and improve the user experience, saving time and money. PowerToys is continuously updated with even more utilities added every few months.

articles.title: ‘Ye toh saunf hai': Fancy tin of candied fennel seeds sold online sparks amusement among Indians
articles.author: HT Trending Desk
articles.summary: Paro is offering tins of 'candied fennel seeds' on its website. The product is sold for ₹2,800 for an 8-pack or ₹2,520 on subscription. The company is marketing this product as 'grounded in grandmotherhood'.

articles.title: FanYogo Announces Bisola Aiyeola as Brand Ambassador in New ‘Original Naija Yoghurt' Campaign
articles.author: Branded Content
articles.summary: FanMilk Ltd has launched a new product, FanYogo drinking yoghurt, in Nigeria. The company has partnered with Bisola Aiyeola as its brand ambassador to promote the new product, which contains Vitamins D, E B1, B12, and Zinc. The advertising campaign is already released online and on TV.

articles.title: Amazon is selling an 'intuitive' $250 smart toilet seat and bidet for $150, and users say 'it'll change your life'
articles.author: Adam Reeder
articles.summary: Amazon is selling a smart toilet seat and bidet. This product offers a welcome respite from your usual routine.

articles.title: I tested 7 butters from Aldi, Tesco, Lidl & more - the best was rich and creamy
articles.author: Ketsuda Phoutinane
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares seven salted butters from different brands. 'All Things Butter' is declared the best, praised for its rich, creamy, and indulgent taste, while Tesco's own brand is rated the lowest due to its oily and tasteless profile. Other brands reviewed include Lurpak, Kerrygold, Aldi Cowbelle, Lidl Dairy Manor, and Anchor.

articles.title: I was gutted when scrubbing didn't get my ‘stained' blender clean, then remembered a £3.25 spray I had in the cupboard
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Fairy introduced the new "Skip the Soak" spray which removes stains, even turmeric, from surfaces and even clothes. A user demonstrated the product's effectiveness on a blender bottle, highlighting its ability to dissolve stains quickly. The spray is available for a budget-friendly price, such as £1 with a Tesco Clubcard voucher, and has received positive feedback from other users for various cleaning tasks.

articles.title: I was gutted when scrubbing didn't get my ‘stained' blender clean, then remembered a £3.25 spray I had in the cupboard
articles.author: Sarah Bull
articles.summary: Fairy launched a new 'Skip the Soak' spray, demonstrated by Hannah to effectively remove stains from a blender. The product is advertised as a quick and easy cleaning solution that eliminates the need for soaking. It can also be used on other surfaces and even clothes.

articles.title: Mega Deals officially launches mobile app on Google Play Store
articles.author: The Peninsula
articles.summary: Mega Deals has launched a new mobile application available on the Google Play Store. The app offers a seamless mobile shopping experience with a chance to win prizes like QR2,500,000 in cash, a Ford Mustang GTP 2024, and 1KG of gold with every purchase.

articles.title: Karcher window vacuum that cleans showers and mirrors in 'minutes' reduced by 43%
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Kärcher Window Vac for £45.99, highlighting its ability to clean windows streak-free by suctioning water. Dunelm sells the TOWER Cordless Window Vacuum for £30. The Kärcher set includes the WV 2 model, a charger, spray bottle, cloth, nozzles, and cleaner concentrate.

articles.title: I tried 7 supermarket salted butters to find the best — the winner tasted of luxury
articles.author: Vita Molyneux
articles.summary: All Things Butter has been rated as the best butter due to its rich, creamy and indulgent taste with the right amount of saltiness. Aldi's Cowbelle stands out due to its vibrant, golden hue and delightful taste. Tesco's own brand butter has been rated poorly due to it being excessively oily and lacking flavour.

articles.title: Kinsler: We are devoted to each other, but each does his/her own laundry
articles.summary: The article discusses the use of 'Laundry Egg,' a new laundry product containing detergent pellets within a yellow plastic container. Users place the 'Laundry Egg' in the washer tub with laundry and press start. Occasionally, the pellets inside the laundry egg need refilling.

articles.title: Morgan Supersport review: the quintessential British sports car brought bang up to date
articles.author: Andrew English
articles.summary: Morgan has launched the Supersport, a new two-seater model priced at £102,000, as a replacement for the Plus Six. The Supersport features a B58 BMW engine, offering a top speed of 166mph and acceleration from 0-62mph in 3.9 seconds. The car is available with either a soft top or a hard top, with the hard top costing an additional £4,194.

articles.title: 26 Useful Products That You'll Be Tempted To Gatekeep
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: Laneige introduces its Neo Blurring Powder for smoothing skin and controlling shine. Skala launches a Brazilian 2-in-1 conditioning treatment with castor oil and shea butter for curly hair. Nyx releases Pore Filler Targeted Stick to reduce the appearance of pores and Maybelline introduces volumizing brow mousse to fill in sparse brows.

articles.title: Environmentally friendly EU ecolabel detergents
articles.author: Times
articles.summary: EU ecolabel detergents are introduced as environmentally friendly cleaning products that meet specific criteria for reduced environmental impact. These detergents, certified by the EU ecolabel, offer benefits such as better biodegradability, less packaging waste, and effective cleaning performance while minimizing harmful chemicals. The range includes laundry, dishwashing, hard surface, and industrial detergents, making sustainable cleaning accessible to various consumers.

articles.title: ‘I tried Wonderskin's new pH blusher to see how well it matched my skin tone'
articles.author: Faith Richardson
articles.summary: Wonderskin has launched its pHLush Stick, a pH-adjusting blusher that adapts to the user's natural skin tone. The product, priced at £20, is a stick formula enriched with hydrating ingredients and aims to deliver a unique, natural-looking flush of color. The pHLush stick can also be applied to your lips and lids too, if you want a cohesive look.

articles.title: "AI, Gaming, and Camera – All in One"… Qualcomm Unveils 'Snapdragon 7 Gen 4'
articles.author: 메트로신문 메트로신문
articles.summary: Qualcomm Technologies has launched its Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 Mobile Platform for mid-premium smartphones. The new platform features advancements such as a 27% increase in CPU performance, 30% boost in GPU rendering speed, and over 65% enhancement in AI performance and includes a Stable Diffusion-based image generation feature.

articles.title: Android Desktop Mode Leak: Source Code Reveals All – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Google is developing 'Android Desktop Mode,' a new feature expected to launch with Android 17 on next-generation Pixel phones, potentially offering multitasking with resizable windows, desktop-like navigation, and advanced app management. Initially connecting via USB-C, wireless connectivity is also speculated, similar to Samsung DeX and Motorola Ready For, before rolling out to other Android devices, this feature will transform Android phones into desktop-like environments.

articles.title: New Look's 'lovely' £30 summer dress that is available in four different colours
articles.author: Ben Lyons
articles.summary: New Look is promoting their new Flutter Sleeve Button Front Midi Dress, priced at £30, as an ideal option for the warmer months. The dress features a v-neck cut, flutter sleeves, side slits, and button front detailing and is available in multiple colors.

articles.title: Yandex Türkiye plans new search and AI features
articles.summary: Yandex Türkiye is introducing the Merchants platform, a tool to help merchants gain traffic and control their performance within Yandex search results. The company is also promoting Yandex Metrica, a free analytics tool for e-commerce platforms, and enhancing its search engine with a $50 million investment as part of a larger $400 million plan. Additionally, Yandex's AI tool, Yazeka, is experiencing increased usage among Turkish users.

articles.title: EATMEAT in Bolton's lobster tail served from a book
articles.author: Liam Milton
articles.summary: Eat Meat restaurant chain unveiled an innovative way to serve its lobster tail dish. The lobster tail is served inside a book that is set alight, revealing the freshly-cooked lobster. The video of the dish has garnered significant attention on TikTok, with nearly one million views.

articles.title: 25 Target Finds For An Effortless Skincare Routine
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: The article highlights the introduction of various skincare products, including a lightweight gel cream moisturizer, Tula face cleanser, E.l.f. daily cleanser, and a sport sunscreen spray, providing details on their benefits, prices, and user reviews. Additionally, it mentions products like Good Molecules Yerba Mate wake-up eye gel, Jergens cherry almond moisturizer, and Honest Beauty hydrogel moisturizer.

articles.title: How creatives are using AI to cut working time and improve results
articles.summary: BFL Group launched a new product line in 2024 utilizing AI-generated content. In 2024, Sephora launched an AI humanizer for customer interactions, resulting in a 25% sales increase. These examples demonstrate the implementation and impact of new AI-driven products and services within the retail sector.

articles.title: 7-Eleven will introduce three types of kitchen detergent, laundry detergent, and textile softener in..
articles.author: Jung Seulgi
articles.summary: 7-Eleven is launching three types of small-dose (300ml) kitchen detergent, laundry detergent, and textile softener on the 21st. The new product line includes small-capacity versions of 'Pigeon High Concentrated Mystic Lane' textile softener and 'Pure Poddeuk Kitchen Detergent'. To commemorate the launch, 7-Eleven will hold a 2+1 event for these products.

articles.title: ZEE Entertainment Takes A Bold Leap Into The Future As A Content, Technology Powerhouse
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: ZEE Entertainment Enterprises Ltd. ('Z') has unveiled a new and dynamic brand universe, including a new logo and brand promise ('Yours Truly, Z'). This refresh aims to reflect the company's future ambitions and commitment to innovation, with the new brand elements being integrated across all platforms on June 8th, 2025, during the ZEE Cine Awards telecast. The strategic shift emphasizes the integration of content and technology to enhance consumer experience.

articles.title: LG Electronics announced on the 18th that Trom Wash Tower has surpassed 1 million cumulative sales i..
articles.author: Lee Sang-Deok
articles.summary: LG Electronics announced that cumulative sales of its Trom Wash Tower in Korea have surpassed 1 million units. The new AI Wash Tower, released this year, has strengthened AI functions such as 'AI Time Guidance' and 'AI My Course,' along with the Trusteam function in both the washing machine and dryer. The drying capacity has also been expanded to 25kg, making it the largest in Korea.

articles.title: Amazon Says It's ‘Continuously Inviting' New Users to Join Alexa Plus
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa Plus, an enhanced AI version of Alexa, and hundreds of thousands of users have access to it through early access invitations. The service is available for free to Amazon Prime members or for $19.99 per month for other users. Amazon is still rolling out some features, like web browser access and integration with Fire TV and Amazon tablets.

articles.title: JTI factory gears up for stronger demand
articles.author: EYES WIDE OPEN
articles.summary: JTI's Vårgårda facility is preparing to produce Nordic Spirit nicotine pouches for distribution in the UK, Canada, France, and the Philippines. This expansion signifies a shift towards smoke-free alternatives and caters to growing consumer demand for these products.

articles.title: Snoonu's S5 transformation: Building Qatar's most complete digital ecosystem
articles.author: The Peninsula
articles.summary: Snoonu launched its newest innovation, S5, in 2025. S5 positions Snoonu at the forefront of super apps.

articles.title: Most Exciting Launch Games Confirmed For The Nintendo Switch 2
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch after a long wait. The Nintendo Switch is launching.

articles.title: 2025 Hyundai Tucson Hybrid
articles.summary: Hyundai is launching the latest Tucson Hybrid with updated style and tech. Infiniti is introducing the 2025 QX80, a new generation vehicle. Honda is releasing the Goldwing 50th Anniversary edition.
